title: Ginga Patrol PJ
synopsis: Once Upon a Time... Space differs from the rest of the Once Upon a Time titles in the sense that the series revolve on a dramatic content rather than an educational premise. The series still has a handful of educational information (such as an episode discussing the rings of Planet Saturn).
voices: ['Inaba, Minoru', 'Tomiyama, Kei', 'Takizawa, Roko', 'Hayami, Show', 'Tomita, Kousei', 'Ono, Kenichi', 'Hara, Eriko']
